title: KnorraSky: The Deception
description: This file was updated 5/20/2012 due to a complaint that it may have become corrupted. This file is working perfectly.2009 Next Generation Indie Book Awards Finalist.Fiction/FantasyKnorraSky the Deception, is an exciting story of courage and heartbreak, love and loss, set amidst a medieval setting. The opening pages describe a confident king, Noman, who leads his people without hesitation. Soon things changes when during an epic battle a Deception occurs and Noman is forced to confront his worst fears. The Deception is epic, spanning 3000 miles and five years, as King Noman battles many adversaries, but his greatest enemy lies within.340,000 words
author: R.A. Knowlton
